Appeal lodged in fight to get Children’s Minister Karen Chhour to appear before Waitangi Tribunal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/appeal-lodged-in-fight-to-get-childrens-minister-karen-chhour-to-appear-before-waitangi-tribunal/VTQQNE3GJFG6XCMCONSE5T2K2U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/appeal-lodged-in-fight-to-get-childrens-minister-karen-chhour-to-appear-before-waitangi-tribunal/VTQQNE3GJFG6XCMCONSE5T2K2U/ Cherie HowieKīngitanga, Tainui and Māori Women’s Welfare League have given "words of support" - lawyer Thu, 25 Apr 2024 00:23:51 +0000 The Government was moving quickly, so they had to as well, said lawyer Annette Sykes of the move to appeal a High Court decision made against the Waitangi Tribunal's attempts to compell Children's Minister Karen Chhour to appear before it. Photo / Supplied

Man charged after 70-year-old, two others held hostage, firearm discharged at Bay of Plenty police https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-charged-after-70-year-old-two-others-held-hostage-firearm-discharged-at-bay-of-plenty-police/NSMNQO67HFBP7OKWOFDRGQZXVM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-charged-after-70-year-old-two-others-held-hostage-firearm-discharged-at-bay-of-plenty-police/NSMNQO67HFBP7OKWOFDRGQZXVM/ Anna LeaskA man is in custody after a firearm was discharged at police in the Bay of Plenty.
